name: BrVR (Backrooms Virtual Reality) Level 0
description:
BrVR (Backrooms Virtual Reality) is a survival horror game based on the backrooms, a popular internet creepypasta. We've been enamored with the backrooms for months now, and we've decided to make a game based on it! Roam around the halls and corridors, encounter dangerous entities, and drink almond water to stay sane.

In case you aren't familiar with The Backrooms: http://backrooms-wiki.wikidot.com/level-0

This Game Requires A Virtual Reality Headset And A Windows PC!                             

This is a HORROR game! If you are easily frightened, this may not be the game for you. This is not a flat-screen pc game. Please don't leave bad reviews if you aren't using a head-mounted display and motion controllers. 

We tested this game using a Win10 PC with an RTX2060. We suggest a minimum of:

  • Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 470/570 or greater.
  • CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or greater.
  • Memory: 8GB.

Left Thumbstick = Move

B button = Jump

Red bar on wrist = Hunger

Blue bar on wrist = Sanity

You have 2 physical inventory slots on your shoulders/back to carry items.

X button (Quest 2) = Settings

There are currently no Comfort settings or teleport, but there is a seated mode in the settings menu.

Expect jump scares and creepy-looking entities.

Visit us at WooStudiosBTV.com for news!
